name: Tile Master - Classic Triple Match & Puzzle Game
name_original: Tile Master - Classic Triple Match & Puzzle Game
description:
Tile Master is a matching game. In the game,you need blow your mind and match 3 numbers of block.When all tiles were matched, you can pass the current level.Our puzzle game includes large numbers of level. some levels will be hard,Challenge your mind and solve puzzles, And then it will be a easy game.

Learn more about Tile Master：

◈The new version of Tile Master with simple rules and addictive gameplay: Match pairs of identical fruits or butterfly tiles (choose three same block), clear all the tiles, Win! Make a blast in Tile Master.

◈Have no time limit, enjoy your time and train your brain in this match-3 puzzle game.

◈Complete different levels, unlock map one by one, let's travel the exciting world with Tile Master!!

Game features：
● Choose tiles into the box. Three same tiles will be eliminate. Over 30+ cute tiles,10+ skins and themes, thousands of layouts and useful tips , undo and powerful boosters.

● Challenge funny levels , Collect more stars, unlock more world maps and enjoy your brain time.

● Available to play on mobile and tablet devices.

● Connect all fruits and eliminate it.

●Each tile board is different and varies from one to the next.

●Casual and easy gameplay, open your mind.

●Connect three tiles, enjoy this free puzzle board games.

●More harder level, unique tile sets. challenge yourself.

Try our free solitaire puzzle games and Play OFFLINE/FREE in anytime, anywhere either Phone or tablet.

In the app, we will use the read_phone_state, write_ external_ storage, read_external_storage
